price: 51.Sheetan kee kay Samaday isin taqbudecni, qaranwaa kee baaxô ginot masgalliyo catoh, kaadu mara mari ginot keenik masgalliyooy dibuk ken gine, kaadu sheetoonaa kee seehadak makkoote mara catoh haysite makkinniyo iyye Yalli.
arabic: ۞ مَّآ أَشۡهَدتُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā ashhadttuhum khalqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walā khalqa anfusihim wamā kuntu muttakhidha al-muḍilīna ʿaḍudan
